title: Electroleaching and electrodeposition of silver in ethaline 1 : 2 and propeline 1 : 3: transport properties and electrode phenomena
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00042K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Calogera Bertoloni, Sophie Legeai, Stéphanie Michel, Eric Meux, François Lapicque
We consider the potentiality of propeline, a DES with a lower toxic nature than ethaline, for the electrometallurgy of silver.
